question: Which Indian bank has tied up with Inter-American Investment Corporation (IIC) to boost trade with Latin America?
explanation: Axis Bank has tied up with Inter-American Investment Corporation (IIC) to  facilitate trade with Latin America and the Caribbean. It is the first Indian bank to participate in the Trade Finance Facilitation Programme as a confirming bank. IIC, a member of the Inter-American Development Bank Group, is a multilateral development bank committed to supporting the private sector in Latin America and the Caribbean.
